name: ast-loc-utils
description: Tools for manipulating node source locations in a Babel AST.

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:babel:commonjs: mkdirp lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs npm run build:babel:base -- src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:babel:debug: mkdirp lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs npm run build:babel:base -- src --out-dir lib --source-maps
scripts.build:babel:istanbul: mkdirp build/coverage && cross-env BABEL_ENV=istanbul npm run build:babel:base -- src --out-dir build/coverage
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:mocha
scripts.test:debug: npm run build:babel:debug && npm run test:mocha:debug
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:build && npm run coverage:report

author: William C. Johnson <wcjohnson@oigroup.net> (https://github.com/wcjohnson)
